product_name: The North Face Eat My Dust Shorts - Women's
long_description: Packed with high-performance features, The North Face Eat My Dust Shorts for women make tough training sessions just a bit more comfortable with their fast-drying technical fabric. Fabric is soft, lightweight and smooth to the touch, and both the liner shorts and the outer fabric wick moisture and dry quickly. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish that causes moisture to bead up and roll off. Contoured-mesh waistband offers a superior fit that won't ride up or dig in as you pound down the trail. A breathable mesh liner eliminates chafing when running long distances. Carry a small item, such as a key or energy gel, in the rear zippered pocket; also compatible with an MP3 player. Ruffled detailing along sides adds a touch of femininity. The North Face Eat My Dust shorts increase visibility in dim light thanks to reflective logos.
short_description: Packed with high-performance features, The North Face Eat My Dust Shorts for women make tough training sessions just a bit more comfortable with their fast-drying technical fabric.
